q: I think that identification and empathy is great to see." Coming from a poor, working-class background, Helena Kennedy feels particularly strongly about education as it was such a pivotal force in her own life. Learning shouldn't be a commodity. It changed me: I learned about the other, about how the world worked, about art and music. Education will continue to be available to the privileged, but will it be for someone from a background like mine? Barack Obama !( CNN)-- President Bush Secretary of State Colin Powell announced Sunday that he will be voting for Barack Obama , citing the Democrat's "ability to inspire" and the "inclusive nature of his campaign." I think he is a transformational figure, he is a new generation coming onto the world stage, onto the American stage, and for that reason I'll be voting for Barack Obama , Colin Powell said on NBC's "Meet the Press." He said he was disappointed in the president's budget proposal. This senator will do everything he can to make sure that the budget is not balanced on the backs of the weak, the vulnerable, the sick or the old who can't afford to heat their homes in the winter, he said.
